Topic.Title: what to do when the site times out while trying to download

Posts.EditableText: What do i  do when trying to download a game I am making, but it times out both when I publish and download? This has been going on for over a year. Not only that, but, the game, if locked up by enabling devmode in Quest, it you won't be able to edit it to turn off devmode because it locked up your game so bad that you can't edit it. This is not a case of being able to play a game, this is a case of not being able to make one and continue it's development.
Posts.HTML: What do i do when trying to download a game I am making, but it times out both when I publish and download? This has been going on for over a year. Not only that, but, the game, if locked up by enabling devmode in Quest, it you won't be able to edit it to turn off devmode because it locked up your game so bad that you can't edit it. This is not a case of being able to play a game, this is a case of not being able to make one and continue it's development.

Posts.EditableText: I thought the devmode thing had been fixed. If not, it might be necessary to ask the site admin if they can extract the file for you.
Posts.HTML: I thought the devmode thing had been fixed. If not, it might be necessary to ask the site admin if they can extract the file for you.
